artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Takenouchi Magohachi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: travelers with horse walking narrow road between close buildings with pitched rooftops; a few trees lining road; gray streaks of rain crisscross the scene; gray ground and hills; foreboding clouds at top, yellowish sky
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

Inscription ULQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi no uchi 東海道五十三次之内), also known as the First Tōkaidō or Hōeidō Tōkaidō
title: Ōiso--Rain of Tora's Tears
